summary: Replace some of Skyrim\'s musics with Monster Hunter\'s ones.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replace some of Skyrim\'s musics with the ones from the Monster Hunter game franchise. As for now, most of the musics I\'m using are from Monster Hunter Tri.

Version 1.0 features :

-Replacements for Dragon battle musics

If you want a more complete Monster Hunter experience in this game, then you may like this :

Monster Hunter for Skyrim by Syncing : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6429
author: Soap971
